# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ecda-102">Dodajanje zastavic in opomnikov v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ecda-103">Če želite nastaviti ali urediti opomnik za dogodek:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-104">Pojdite na [koledar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-105">Izberite dogodek, za katerega želite, da vas opomni, nato pa izberite puščice v zgornjem desnem kotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-106">, da ga razširite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-107">Ob možnosti **Opomni me**izberite čas opomnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="6ecda-108">Outlook.com samodejno shrani vaše spremembe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ecda-109">Če se želite spomniti na nadaljnje delo s sporočilom, lahko dodate zastavico za nadaljnje delo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-110">Obiščite spletno mesto [pošta](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-111">Na seznamu sporočil premaknite kazalec miške nad sporočilo, da si ogledate možnost zastavice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-112">Izbira ikone zastavice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-113">Če želite označiti sporočilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6ecda-114">Če si želite ogledati vsa sporočila, označena z zastavico, izberite kljukico v spodnjem levem kotu strani, da se poiščete v opravilih.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="6ecda-115">Če želite izvedeti več, preberite [zastavico ali pripenjanje sporočila v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ecda-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
